document.full_text: chevron corp , the second-largest u.s. oil company, reported a larger-than-expected 36 percent rise in earnings on friday, as oil prices surged and refining improved along with global fuel demand.
document.title: chevron profit rises 36 percent with oil price surge
lines_and_colors: chevron corp , the second-largest u.s. oil company, reported a larger-than-expected 36 percent rise in earnings on friday, as oil prices surged and refining improved along with global fuel demand.
